title: Lew Lipset's 19th Century Baseball Woodcuts Scrapbook (April, 2010 Auction)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: Lew Lipset's 19th Century Baseball Woodcuts Scrapbook (April, 2010 Auction)
posts.post_content: If the winner of the above described item is a member of this board, I would be very interested in purchasing a few select pages from the scrapbook and would be willing to pay up to $1,000 each for those that I am looking for. If you are the owner of the scrapbook and may be interested in selling a few select pages, please e-mail me directly at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
